mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_access_log ( username, job, access_time, user_agent, ip_address, access_page ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{job}, #{accessTime}, #{userAgent}, #{ipAddress}, #{accessPage} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, job, access_time as accessTime, user_agent as userAgent, ip_address as ipAddress, access_page as accessPage FROM user_access_log WHERE username = #{username} ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT username, job, MAX(access_time) as accessTime, COUNT(*) as accessSystemCount, MAX(user_agent) as userAgent, MAX(ip_address) as ipAddress FROM user_access_log GROUP BY username, job ORDER BY accessSystemCount DESC, accessTime DESC
